_sText:
Office_redone (44 Players)
-Optimized
-Changed lighting & textures. Added skybox and altered atmosphere.
-Added debris in front of red room.
-Stacked tires to create another place to hide.
-Added new LongOffice room.
-Narrowed/lowered some doorways.

Ka_cssmc_zombie (56 Players)
-Optimized.
-Added light + skybox.
-Fixed players spawning outside buyzone.
-Made bottom room 2 separate rooms.
-Added second ladder near CT spawn, prevents crowding.
-Added second ledge by fan buttons.
-Added ledges inside glass box.

OfficeRampage Fixed (40 Players)
-Lessened useless props (i.e. plants, pictures, cabinets, computers).
-Altered fade distances.
-Made PoolRoom more balanced.
-Made CornerOffice more balanced.

Office_Unlimited
-Optimized
-Made 3 Maintenance areas barricade-able. (look at pix)
-Made Storage Room near T spawn barricade-able.
-Players take damage if glitched above/below elevator.


HorrorTown (48 Players)
-Renamed Horrorhood to Horrortown.
-Optimized a lot. Tripled the FPS, no more flashing lights.
-Balanced most spots.
-Added stack-o-logs in backyard stop dead-end problem.

Enjoy hope everyone likes my work. I've put more effort into this that my previous mappack so everything should be nice and smooth.
